value.name: magnetism friction
value.tooltip: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

value.name: magnetism adhesion
value.tooltip: how much the crosshair sticks to enemies

value.name: inconsequential target scale
value.tooltip: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

value.name: look acceleration time
value.tooltip: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

value.name: look acceleration scale
value.tooltip: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

value.name: look peg threshold
value.tooltip: magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in

value.name: look autolevelling scale
value.tooltip: 1 is fast, 0 is none, >1 will probably be really fast

value.name: minimum weapon swap ticks
value.tooltip: amount of time player needs to hold down ACTION to pick up a new weapon

value.name: minimum autolevelling ticks
value.tooltip: amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

value.name: minimum angle for vehicle flipping
value.tooltip: 0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up

value.name: linear corner fade
value.tooltip: used for shadows

value.name: distance attenuation 2D
value.tooltip: the pc can't use 3d textures, so we use this instead

value.name: weapon list update _weapon_list enum in game_globals.h
stun movement penalty
value.tooltip: 1.0 prevents moving while stunned

value.name: stun turning penalty
value.tooltip: 1.0 prevents turning while stunned

value.name: stun jumping penalty
value.tooltip: 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned

value.name: minimum stun time
value.tooltip: all stunning damage will last for at least this long

value.name: maximum stun time
value.tooltip: no stunning damage will last for longer than this

value.name: ground friction scale
value.tooltip: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

value.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
value.tooltip: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

value.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
value.tooltip: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

value.name: ground depth scale
value.tooltip: depth a point mass rests in the ground

value.name: ground damp fraction scale
value.tooltip: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick

value.name: velocity scale
value.tooltip: scales initial velocity

value.name: radius
value.tooltip: particle radius
